If you can\'t find your coffee it means it hasn\'t been reviewed yet. Be the first one scanning its barcode!

You are going to add this product to the category coffees.

Acidity is a primary coffee flavor sensation that is perceived as a pleasing sharpness toward the front of the mouth, a numbing sensation on the tip of the tongue, or a dryness at the back of the palate and/or under the edges of the tongue.

Aroma is the smell of coffee. It is responsible for many of the flavor attributes not directly perceived by the tongue (which are sweet, salt, bitter, sour and umami). There are over 800 known aromatics in coffee with new ones being discovered regularly thanks to advances in testing equipment.

It is a feeling of heaviness and of some sort of “strength” that we can discern with coffee in the mouth, especially by pressing the tongue against the palate. The definition of “body” is used to indicate the structure of the drink and corresponds to a certain coffee consistency felt on the palate.
Aftertaste refers to the tastes and aromas left in the mouth after swallowing. Compared to other drinks, coffee flavours hang around for a long time.
Final score that you think this cafe has. Remember that taste is something personal.
